name: Avraamovo Lono (2022)
description:
Prologue to subsequent creativity: I create, therefore I am.

«Art liberates the life that people have imprisoned»
— Gilles Deleuze.

«Heroism – that is the disposition of a man who aspires to a goal compared to which he himself is wholly insignificant. Heroism is the good will to self-destruction»
— Friedrich Nietzsche.

The act of creation is an act of manifestation of our self, elusive all the time, but fixed in part. It is obviously inseparable from art and constantly gravitates toward it, being in real attachment.
